About

Welcome to my site!
I am Mackenzie, a master's student majoring in software engineering at San Jose State University.

I am graduating in December 2020, and looking for full-time software development opportunities starting after graduation.

Please feel free to email me if you have any opportunities for me! (or pictures of cute puppies)
